alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 1:25PM EDT until May 18 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... West central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/. * At 125 PM EDT/1225 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Port St. Joe, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Nine Mile, Apalachicola Airport, Tilton and Bay City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
